value.name: Shining Solo
value.overview: K-pop boy group TREASURE doesn't often get the chance to focus on romance. But in this show, the group members test their wits - and their charms - as they compete for the title of "Mr. TREASURE!" A group of beautiful women join the group at "TREASURE Castle" to judge each member's romantic attractiveness, and each day's winner receives a jewel. The members of the group must become love rivals to win the hearts of women, but which of them has what it takes to win the biggest prize? "Shining SOLO" is a 2024 South Korean variety show produced by Park Mi Yeon.
